findings.title: Optimization, `_governance` should be immutable
findings.description: The `_governance` variable should be made immutable to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: Improper Readability of Data Comparison
findings.description: The statement 'data < uint256(1) << 192' could be made more readable with 'data <= type(uint192).max'

findings.title: Unused `Storage` Import
findings.description: The `Storage` import is not utilized anywhere in the contract.

findings.title: Readability Improvement
findings.description: Use '4 days' instead of '60 * 60 * 24 * 4' for better readability.

findings.title: **Major**, `queryVotePower()` allows querying the same vault multiple times gaining unfair voting power.
findings.description: Allows querying the same vault multiple times to gain unfair voting power

findings.title: Optimization of `joined` Variable
findings.description: No need to rewrite the `joined` variable, just update `votingVaults`

findings.title: Wrong Order of Params in VoteChange Event
findings.description: The order of parameters in the VoteChange event is incorrect.

findings.title: Wrong Order of Params in `VoteChange` Event
findings.description: The order of parameters in the `VoteChange` event is incorrect.

findings.title: Wrong Order of Params in `VoteChange` Event
findings.description: The parameters in the `VoteChange` event are in the wrong order.

findings.title: Wrong Order of Params in VoteChange Event
findings.description: The `VoteChange` event has parameters in the wrong order.

findings.title: Irrelevant Comments
findings.description: The comments are not relevant and seem to be a copy from the deposit function.

findings.title: Irrelevant Comments
findings.description: Comments copied from deposit function are not relevant

findings.title: Irrelevant Comments
findings.description: Comments copied from deposit function are not relevant.

findings.title: Readability Improvement
findings.description: Using '7 days' instead of '60 * 60 * 24 * 7' for better readability.

findings.title: Frontrunning issue
findings.description: Frontrunning issue which is planned to be mitigated with an after transaction check.

findings.title: **One remaining major issue allows temporarily gaining victims voting power during the initial LockingVault deposit.**
findings.description: Temporarily gaining victims voting power during the initial LockingVault deposit.
